Resources

name path methods description
ActionREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/actions
  • /orgs/{org_id}/actions/action_order
  • /orgs/{org_id}/actions/{id}
  • /orgs/{org_id}/actions/{id}/view
  • GET POST
  • GET PUT
  • DELETE GET PUT
  • GET
Service for interacting with actions.
AdminInvitationREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/invitations
  • /orgs/{org_id}/invitations/{invite_id}
  • GET POST
  • DELETE GET PUT
Endpoints for managing user invitations. Only master administrators are allowed to perform these operations.
AutomaticTaskREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/automatic_tasks
  • /orgs/{org_id}/automatic_tasks/{id}
  • GET POST
  • DELETE GET PUT
Service endpoints for managing automatic tasks. These are "template" tasks that used by rules to instantiate incident tasks.
ConfigurationsREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/configurations/exports
  • /orgs/{org_id}/configurations/imports
  • /orgs/{org_id}/configurations/exports/history
  • /orgs/{org_id}/configurations/exports/{export_id}
  • /orgs/{org_id}/configurations/imports/history
  • /orgs/{org_id}/configurations/imports/{import_id}
  • /orgs/{org_id}/configurations/imports/{import_id}/status
  • POST
  • POST
  • GET
  • GET POST
  • GET
  • PUT
  • PUT
The endpoints for managing configuration import and export.
ConstREST
  • /const
  • GET
Endpoint for retrieving various constant information for this server. This information is useful in translating names that the user sees to IDs that other REST API endpoints accept. For example, the incidentDTO has a field called "crimestatus_id". The valid values are stored in constDTO.crime_statuses.
CurrentUserREST
  • /users/{user_id}
  • /users/{user_id}/password
  • GET PUT
  • PUT
Endpoints for getting and setting information about the current user. Note that these methods work only with the currently authenticated user, even though they accept a user_id path parameter.
DataTableDataREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/incidents/{inc_id}/table_data
  • /orgs/{org_id}/incidents/{inc_id}/table_data/{table_id}
  • /orgs/{org_id}/incidents/{inc_id}/table_data/{table_id}/row_data
  • /orgs/{org_id}/incidents/{inc_id}/table_data/{table_id}/row_data/{row_id}
  • GET
  • GET
  • DELETE POST
  • DELETE PUT
The endpoint for managing a data table's data for an incident. Tables can be referred to by their internal ID or their programmatic name. Cell data can be referred to by their internal ID or their column programmatic name.
GroupREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/groups
  • /orgs/{org_id}/groups/{id}
  • /orgs/{org_id}/groups/{id}/has_assignments
  • GET POST
  • DELETE GET PUT
  • GET
Implementation for the /rest/groups REST methods.

NotificationREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/notifications
  • /orgs/{org_id}/notifications/info
  • /orgs/{org_id}/notifications/{id}
  • DELETE GET
  • GET
  • DELETE
Implementation for the /rest/notifications REST methods. These services allow you to determine which notifications are available for a user, delete them, etc.

ScriptREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/scripts
  • /orgs/{org_id}/scripts/{script_id}
  • GET POST
  • DELETE GET PUT
The endpoint for managing the invokable scripts for an Org.
SearchExREST
  • /search_ex
  • POST
Endpoint for performing full text searches through incidents and incident child objects (tasks, incident comments, task comments, milestones, artifacts, incident attachments, task attachments, and data tables).
SearchREST
  • /search
  • GET POST
Endpoints for searching for tasks and incidents using the search index.

TypeREST
  • /orgs/{org_id}/types
  • /orgs/{org_id}/types/{type}
  • /orgs/{org_id}/types/{type}/fields
  • /orgs/{org_id}/types/{type}/fields/{field}
  • GET POST
  • DELETE GET PUT
  • GET POST
  • DELETE GET PUT
Endpoints for viewing and editing built-in types and fields (incident, task, artifact, milestone, attachment, actioninvocation, and note), and CRUD operations on custom types and fields (Data Tables)
WorkflowREST
